verses.name: John 12:17
verses.text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave, and raised him from the dead, bare record.

verses.name: John 12:18
verses.text: For this cause the people also met him, for that they heard that he had done this miracle.

verses.name: John 12:19
verses.text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves, Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing? behold, the world is gone after him.

verses.name: John 12:20
verses.text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast:

verses.name: John 12:21
verses.text: The same came therefore to Philip, which was of Bethsaida of Galilee, and desired him, saying, Sir, we would see Jesus.
